text: Observatoire de Haute-Provence (Observatory of Haute-Provence in French) is the main astronomical observatory in the southeast of France. It is about from Marseilles and east of Avignon. The four main telescopes have diameters between . They discover exoplanets, asteroids, etc. Category:Buildings and structures in France Category:Astronomical observatories
title: Observatoire de Haute-Provence
